title: METAVERSE
description: Welcome to the Metaverse Front-End Playground – your gateway to web development in the metaverse! 🌐🚀 This open-source repository empowers developers to explore, innovate, and collaborate in the virtual space. Whether you're an expert showcasing projects or a newcomer diving in, join our dynamic community and shape the future of the metaverse!

title: Travel_Website
description: This repository contains my project on a Travel Website✈️ using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. It features a landing page for a travel tour company website. Finding the perfect travel destination can be a challenge. This project aims to streamline that process🚤. We welcome all contributions to make this a fantastic resource for travelers. Jump in and contribute to this grand project! Read the guidelines📚 and get started building!

title: Bot-Collection
description: Collection of all bots that automate the daily tasks.

title: TalkitOut
description: Talkitout is an open source django based social media platform currently this is 3rd year of the project being in codepeak.

title: the-cute-frontend
description: The cute frontend is basically a project on react js frontend only server which comes with its fake server to see the working and gain experience in React Js.

title: Moksh
description: Moksh is a spiritual productivity tool designed for individuals who want to unlock their potential and achieve true balance in life. With Moksh, you can overcome the mental problems that arise from our body consciousness and find true happiness.

title: PetMe
description: PetMe is an all-in-one platform that allows animals to be adopted, donated to pet lovers, and provides emergency medical care to stray animals in need.

title: Face-X
description: Face-X is a comprehensive repository of algorithms and operations related to facial recognition, which includes a range of functionalities from facial filters, image processing, face mask detection, and facial attendance systems to animated emotions and facial cartoonification.

title: eik-courses
description: Website for an educational Youtube channel.

title: Resonate
description: Resonate is here to harness the power of open-source for voice-based social media. Whether it's sharing immersive stories, engaging in dynamic live discussions, or connecting through pair chats and voice calls, Resonate is designed to put voice at the center of your social experience.

title: AutomaticVideoMaker
description: AutomaticVideoMaker: A drawing animation maker and automatic content generator for creating cool ready to post story videos. Currently it can generate really amazing drawing animations, with wikipedia and image scraping it can work as a one command informational video generator for any topic.

title: AIPersonalizedLearningPlatform
description: AIPersonalizedLearningPlatform: Imagine a platform that gives you a detailed personalized roadmap along with resources for any topic that you want to learn, based on your individual needs, time constraints, preferable language, and current knowledge level. This is exactly what our AI-driven web based educational platform delivers.

title: premiumPortfolios
description: A personal portfolio template generator which can create customized personal websites for anyone.

title: DL-Simplified
description: This open-source repository is a comprehensive collection of deep learning projects, ranging from beginner to advanced levels. Our aim is to demystify deep learning concepts and provide a hands-on platform for contributors to start or deepen their journey into the fascinating world of neural networks. Whether you're a seasoned machine learning expert or just getting started, there's something here for everyone!

title: ingenuity-ai.onrender.com
description: Ingenuity is a subscription-based AI tool platform to dynamically converse with the user as well as generate code, images, videos, and music in response to user inputs.

title: Terrain-Recognition
description: Terrain-Recognition with fast inference for edge and military equipment.

title: complaint_app
description: The Government Complaint Management App lets users log in via Google or phone, submit complaints with text, images, and location data, and select the department, sub-department, and officer. Officers get real-time notifications and can manage complaints by resolving or commenting. Admins monitor complaints via a dashboard with metrics by officer, department, and area, ensuring efficient issue handling.

title: Shim-Services
description: ShimServices  is a comprehensive platform designed to bridge the gap between skilled professionals and end users by providing a seamless service marketplace. The platform is inspired by urban lifestyle needs and offers an efficient way for individuals and businesses to access services across multiple categories such as home cleaning, beauty and wellness, appliance repair, tutoring, and more.

title: Bookify
description: Bookify is an innovative online platform designed for book enthusiasts to explore, purchase, and enjoy a vast collection of eBooks. It provides a seamless and engaging user experience, catering to diverse preferences and reading habits.

title: Tabnavi
description: A secure, cross-platform password management application built with React Native. TabNavi provides robust password management features including secure storage, password generation, and data breach monitoring, all while ensuring your credentials remain safe both online and offline.

title: AI Flowchart App
description: AI Flowchart App

title: Anwesha Site
description: Official implementation of backend of Anwesha website - The annual cultural fest of IIT Patna

title: openfire
description: Openfire is an open-source real-time collaboration (RTC) server using XMPP, licensed under Apache. It’s easy to set up and manage while ensuring strong security and performance. Written in Java, it features a flexible plugin architecture for easy extensibility. With over two decades of development, Openfire is a mature solution, serving as both a turn-key IM platform and a customizable foundation for instant messaging or data-sharing applications.

title: pygoat
description: PyGoat is an open-source project that helps developers and security enthusiasts learn to mitigate vulnerabilities in Python web apps. Featuring intentionally vulnerable code, it provides hands-on experience with issues like SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF. A proud participant in Google Summer of Code (GSoC), PyGoat is ideal for learners and contributors looking to enhance security skills while collaborating on a globally recognized initiative.

title: codelens
description: CodeLens is a comprehensive platform designed to elevate your competitive programming experience. With a suite of powerful tools at your disposal, including test case generation, constraint validation, solution optimization, code coverage analysis, and automated evaluation, CodeLens enables you to delve deep into your code, uncover insights, and enhance your problem-solving skills.

title: MediBridge
description: MediBridge is a web application transforming rural healthcare with AI-driven diagnostics. It integrates machine learning for accurate health assessments, featuring an AI-powered diagnostic system, service highlights, client testimonials, and a contact form. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and optionally Flask, it offers seamless interaction and can function as a standalone frontend or with a Flask backend for enhanced capabilities.

title: ML-ProjectKart
description: This kart showcases the finest collection of all projects based on machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, natural language processing and more. The main aim is to provide an efficient beginner-friendly projects repository that would help in mastering the ML/AI algorithms and all the hands-on it needs..

title: StockCast
description: This project focuses on predicting the stock prices of "The State Bank Of India" using machine learning Regression algorithms.

title: PyVerse
description: PyVerse is an open-source hub for Python enthusiasts to explore, contribute, and learn across domains like web development, machine learning, automation, cybersecurity, and game development. With a well-organized repository, it welcomes developers of all skill levels to find projects, contribute code, and collaborate. PyVerse fosters innovation and growth, promoting continuous learning in Python development.

title: Whizzify
description: Whizzify is a Web3 platform designed to revolutionize how organizations assess participant engagement during sessions. By leveraging AI and blockchain technology, Whizzify automates quiz generation and reward distribution, ensuring a seamless and efficient process for both organizations and participants.

description: VisualCircuit

title: MedicalChain
description: A comprehensive and unified digital platform designed to facilitate seamless interaction among hospitals, doctors, and patients. This portal enables storage and management of medical data, reports, and other essential health records while also providing a communication channel for enhanced collaboration and coordination in healthcare delivery.

title: codecaffeine
description: Code Caffeine, founded by Harshvardhan Singh Shekhawat, is an online platform for coding projects, blogs, and courses on DSA, web dev, and AI/ML. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and MongoDB, it offers teacher-student modes, role-based authentication, OTP verification, and verified author profiles. Features include an interactive landing page, advanced search, automation, security, and premium pricing. Future plans involve real-time coding, AI-powered learning, and expanded courses.
